Cambridge University Press.

[Prolegomena] Prolegomena to any future
metaphysics. Translation by Gary Hatfield in Theoretical
Philosophy after 1781.

[On a discovery] On a discovery according to which
all future critiques of reason have been rendered superfluous by a
previous one. Translation by Henry Allison in Theoretical
Philosophy after 1781.
